nodes.text: Ka'pkar was the name of a creature living on Makeb until 3638 BBY, when it was killed.

Ka'pkar appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Makeb. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
